alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Miami-Dade County through 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pa-Hay- Okee Overlook, or 10 miles west of Homestead General Airport, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Redland, Everglades National Park, Pa-Hay- Okee Overlook and Royal Palm Ranger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
